text: fya hia vi-ka-swa ma mea-pkae da de ptae-toi . / mea-ze da mea-lgio-ney pno de-tsi kli-ney-tsi / kio-trea-hia-tsi kme ka-hia kli-ka-swa , kwi / v3ai fa-flae ptae-dea-tsi kwi hi-dvo-tsi ma / pkae-da mea-ki . / mno-fy-go psoi-fa-vi-ne de mea-lgio-ney kme / ksea nmae-kfa mea-hia kwa hi-ra-kpoile , di de / kio-tew-ma pkae-da mea-vlo . / sdae ptae-dea , sdae ptae-hia ma kli-pri , te  / dvo ma pkae-da mea-sta-toi vi-kno-spea .

nmae-kfa ptae-hia kli-vi-hea frya ma pkae-da mea-mrai / vi-kry , gzo ma pkae-da mea-floi vi mea-vrea / kwi zai vi-gew boi mea-kea-soma-tsi . / mno-fy-go v3ai mrai-toi vi-kea te vi-stu , / nwo meama-ray de-tsi ptae-dea-tsi kwi nia-via-tsi fmai / mea-sye-hia-soma , roi kwi psoi-ma-tsi pkae-da / mea-pne-tsi ba mea-kwe-ka kli-rdo , pda mea-kpoile / kli-kdie-soma . de nia hi-dvo ma mea-sta-soma / da de kio-tew-ma kli-plea . mea-plea hi-dvo ma / pkae-da mea-vkye ba nmae-kfa mea-hia kli-lno .

haw de kio-tew-ma kli-grey-hea psoi-zai ? / de ptae-wo sa di mea-rgia-sye de-tsi ka-tsi / fmai kwa frya-tsi sta-skai . / ptae-kloi-wo-tsi pkae-da mea-fya-tsi kme fa-hea / tpe mea-via kli-kio-tew-ma , ma-tsi pkae-da / mea-kvae-tsi vi ptae-dea-tsi kli-nrea-tsi , roi / vi mea-kro-tsi vi-via pkae-da mea-ksea-tsi tpe / mea-sfi-soma-tsi kli-pkia-tsi , roi mea-sfi da / lse-sa . pro de mrai kwa mea-ka sa-kme mea-kno / te kwa frya vlye di mea-sta da kio-tew-ma .

mea-mrai-toi-psoi kli-ka ma pkae-da mea-ksea vi de / mea-sfi kli-ldo , kli-via , da rsea mea-bwa / boi ptae-bdi . ka ma nmae-kfa pkia kli-vea , kwi / v3ai-waa mea-sra di kio-hae-to-trea-frey , pro / nia-le-kto de mea-glio vi ptae-bdi-sola vi-lno . / kme vlye-kto ka-tpe , ka-fya-rdo , mea-ka / nsio knoi vi ka-tra-tsi , kme fai sme-zai nmae-kfa / ptae-bdi kli-sai-pa te kli-gew . / mea-ka psoi-kpae nmae-kfa mea-nia-sa-kme de mea-kio / kli-hae-to-trea-frey kwi psoi-ma kli-tro-gew .

ma kli-fa-lfaw da sta-pfae kwa ma kli-snea fa-sta / de-tsi ptae-dea-tsi kli-vi-hea-tsi , te kwa / nia-ka v3ai sta-toi , gzo ma-tsi kli-plea boi kno / te kli-drei boi rsea . / dku , mrai-toi nia-vi ka-sta-toi hi-ma sme-zai / fa-sko boi mea-ne , nwo meama-ska kto mea-ftu / nmae-kfa ptae-prye da soma kli-nde-ki . / de ka-mrai-toi hi-v3ai ma pkae-da mea-kno-ka / te pne-di-hea ptae-dea-tsi-sola kme tew-ka fi-frya / rsea-kno te rsea-hea da mea-sta-sola . . .

kli-ldo-tsi ka-tsi te ka-vey-tsi hia-tsi / go-tsi mea-kno da kio-tew-ma , te / sa-kme fa-sko-de . / ka-3ne-tsi , ka-kde-tsi te kdie-tsi / nia-sa-kme sko de-tsi mea-fa-sko-kno-tsi / gzo v3ai ksea-sta-sola-tsi da kio-tew-ma / te kro kwa de mea-sta ftu-ksea mea-hia kwi / hi-ma kli-lno . fkwe mea-sa-sola-tsi / flae vlye-kto-tsi de-tsi ka-vey-kno-tsi !

mea-kno-spea ! de-ma vi de mea-kno kwa ka-tsi / psoi-ksea-tsi mni-boi-mni nmae-kfa kio-fkai kli-ka / kli-keo-grey-hea kli-vdio-fya-sfi ba mea-kea-sola . / fo-rsea-kno kwa mea-kno-spea ma kli-vdio-gew kwa / mea-gew-bdi . fo-rsea-kno kwa mea-ksea vi-kno-spea / ma kli-vdio-drye kwa mea-kpoile da ptae-sa-sota . / nwo meama-rsea-kno mni-boi-mni mea-kno vlye-kto sme-zai / nmae-kfa mtai-mto , kli-drei vi mea-po-ni ,  / kli-sple vi mea-po-pa .  fo-rsea-kno haw / vlye-kto sme-zai de mtai-mto .
